name: fat_proc_decmap
author: AFNI Developers
description: This program makes a directionally encoded color (DEC) map for DTI results.

inputs.description: Optional mask for picking out a region. Otherwise, only places with FA>0 are given coloration.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Set prefix (and path) for output DWI data.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: For QC1 type of DEC images, use FFF to threshold where DEC values are calculated (default: 0.2).
inputs.name: FA Threshold

inputs.description: For QC2 type of DEC images, use SSS to scale the FA weighting of what would otherwise be a 'classical' DEC map (default: 0.7).
inputs.name: FA Scale

inputs.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default: '__WORKING_decmap').
inputs.name: Working Directory

inputs.description: Do not delete temporary files when finishing.
inputs.name: No Clean

inputs.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files (default: 'PREFIX').
inputs.name: QC Prefix

inputs.description: Do not save the command line call of this program and location where it was run.
inputs.name: No Command Output

inputs.description: Turn off generating QC image files.
inputs.name: No QC View

output-files.description: Single file of type 'rgb' for RGB coloration display.
output-files.name: Output DEC RGB

output-files.description: Single file of type 'rgb' without FA weighting but using FA to threshold where DEC values are calculated.
output-files.name: Output DEC Unweighted Thresholded

output-files.description: DEC file additionally scaled by a value (such as 0.7).
output-files.name: Output DEC Scaled

output-files.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC data.
output-files.name: QC DEC Images

output-files.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC unweighted thresholded data.
output-files.name: QC DEC Unweighted Thresholded Images

output-files.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC scaled data.
output-files.name: QC DEC Scaled Images
